===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|孩子|child}}, with replacement of the diminutive suffix {{zh-l|子|tr=zi|child, son}} by the close-sounding retroflexed counterpart {{zh-l|紙|paper}}. See also {{zh-l|妹紙|young girl; babe}}.
